sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"使不安，使心烦意乱"之意。
means: upset ： 最普通，最通俗用词，侧重失去精神上的平静，心理上完全丧失平衡。
agitate ： 侧重指内心的焦虑，难于控制，表露于外。
disturb ： 指因某人的行动、扰乱、妨碍安静等而使人不得安宁。
perturb ： 书面语用词，指使人焦急烦恼，扰得心情不安。

sentence.Network_en: Her sudden appearance did not seem to perturb him in the least.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的突然出现似乎一点也没有令他不安。

sentence.Network_en: Venus, Earth, and other planets also perturb Mercury's motion.
sentence.Network_cn: 金星, 地球和其他行星也使水星的运动受到摄动.

sentence.Network_en: Stellar passings can perturb the orbits of comets.
sentence.Network_cn: 行星的运行会使彗星的轨道发生扰动.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... permute 改变顺序 perturb 扰乱 perfervid 非常热心的.
新概念第三册精解 ... ●pit v. 使得坑坑洼洼 ●perturb v. 使不安 ●swerve v. 争转变.
考博英语词汇 ... pertinent a． 恰当的；贴切的；中肯的；有关 perturb v. 使不安;烦扰;扰乱;使紊乱 pertussis n. 百日咳.
博士入学考试词汇 - 博士 ... pertinent 适当,有关的 perturb 使心烦意乱,扰乱 peruse 读,阅读.

list.abs: ...浮点运算得到等式，a=f(a1+ ε1,a2+ ε2,a3+ ε3, … ,an+ εn)再推出这些εi的界(εi不是唯一的，且无须求出εi的具体值)，然后再利用摄动理论(perturbation theory)估计最后舍人误差12，01的界。向后误差分析是威尔金森20世纪60年代初在研究矩阵计算的误差时作了系统分析而提出的，目前是计算机上各种数值计算最常用的误差分析手段。20.
量子力学的微扰理论(perturbation theory)引用一些数学的微扰理论的近似方法于量子力学。当遇到比较复杂的量子系统时,这些方法试著将复杂的量子系统简单化或理想化.
perturbation 扰动perturbation energy 微扰能perturbation equation 微扰方程
perturbed angular correlation 微扰的角关联perturbed motion 扰动运动perturbing action 微扰酌
机械工程学专业词汇英语翻译(P) ... perturbation matrix 扰动矩阵 perturbation method 微扰法 perturbation potential 扰动势.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French pertourber, from Latin perturbare, from per- 'completely' + turbare 'disturb'

entry.def: If something perturbs you, it worries you quite a lot.

example.ex: What perturbs me is that magazine articles are so much shorter nowadays.
example.tran: 让我不安的是现在杂志文章都短多了。

means.word_mean: 1. disturb in mind or make uneasy or cause to be worried or alarmed;

sentences.sentence: "She was rather perturbed by the news that her father was seriously ill"

means.word_mean: 2. disturb or interfere with the usual path of an electron or atom;

sentences.sentence: "The electrons were perturbed by the passing ion"

means.word_mean: 3. cause a celestial body to deviate from a theoretically regular orbital motion, especially as a result of interposed or extraordinary gravitational pull;

sentences.sentence: "The orbits of these stars were perturbed by the passings of a comet"

means.word_mean: 4. throw into great confusion or disorder;

sentences.sentence: "Fundamental Islamicists threaten to perturb the social order in Algeria and Egypt"

auth_sentence.content: She worked to perturb Chris, yet didn't notice when she achieved this.
auth_sentence.res_content: She worked to perturb Chris, yet didn't notice when she achieved this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She worked to perturb Chris, yet didn't notice when she achieved this.

auth_sentence.content: Planets are effectively isolated from each other, as they rarely perturb one another's orbit.
auth_sentence.res_content: Planets are effectively isolated from each other, as they rarely perturb one another's orbit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Planets are effectively isolated from each other, as they rarely perturb one another's orbit.

auth_sentence.content: The problem, says Sasai, is that scientists generally "push too hard and perturb the system".
auth_sentence.res_content: The problem, says Sasai, is that scientists generally "push too hard and perturb the system".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The problem, says Sasai, is that scientists generally "push too hard and perturb the system".

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"贯穿,自始至终;全部"; 2. 表示"假,坏"

stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+enn年+ial的→全年的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+man拿住+ent……的→永久拿住→永恒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+nic毒+ious……的→有毒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+plex重叠+ed……的→重叠在一起→困惑的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了→透视的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
per假,坏+funct作用+ory……的→没起好作用→草率的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+cuss摇动,敲打+ion表名词→一直敲打
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+oxide氧化物→贯穿的氧化物→过氧化物
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱
per假,坏+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
per假,坏+jur发誓+y状态→假发誓;参考:jury陪审团
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+forate打孔→打孔穿过→打洞
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+fuse流→流遍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弥漫,遍布,散布;渗入,渗透
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+me走+ate表动词→走过去→渗透过去
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+sist站→站到最后→坚持
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+suade劝→一直劝→劝说
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+use利用→[读书的时候]全部利用→细读
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vade走→走遍,遍及
per假,坏+petr石+ate表动词→像石头一样顽固的做坏事→专横,做坏事
per假,坏+vert转→转向坏→堕落
perturb[n.烦乱,扰乱]+ative……的→adj.扰乱性的
turb搅动,混乱+id表形容词→搅动的→混浊的
turb搅动,混乱+ulent多……的→adj.狂暴的,无秩序的
im不+perturb[n.烦乱,扰乱]+able……的→不受扰乱[影响]
disturb[v.扰乱,妨碍,使不安]+ance表名词→n.动乱,骚乱,干扰
perturb[n.烦乱,扰乱]+ation表名词→n.动摇, 混乱
per贯穿+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 骚动;强烈而不稳定的气流/水流
stems_affixes.word_buile: turb搅动,混乱+ul+ence表名词→骚动
turb搅动,混乱+ine物,机器等→n.汽轮机,涡轮机
tur=turb搅动,混乱+moil翻腾→搅动,翻腾→混乱
dis分开+turb搅动,混乱→搅开了→搅乱了

sentences.en: I am deeply perturbed by the alarming way the situation developing.
sentences.cn: 我对形势令人忧虑的发展深感不安。
